plugins.name: UX4G Theme Craft
plugins.description: UX4G Theme Builder empowers designers to create and customize government-compliant design systems effortlessly. Tailored for the Indian Government's UX4G initiative, this plugin simplifies theming, enabling you to generate color palettes, typography, and component styles that align with the UX4G Design System. Build visually consistent and user-friendly interfaces in minutes with our intuitive interface and robust customization options.
plugins.tagline: Effortless Customization for UX4G Design System

plugins.name: Slice Creator
plugins.description:
✂️ Slice Creator Plugin -- USE FOR EMAILS (KLAVIYO)

Easily split any selected element into even horizontal slices! Perfect for layouts, grids, or exporting assets. 🎉


How to Use 🚀

  1. Select a single element on your Figma canvas.
  2. Enter the number of slices in the plugin.
  3. Hit Create Slices to generate slices instantly!

Features ✨

  1. Quick, precise horizontal slicing.
  2. Auto-selects and zooms into the slices.
  3. Simple and seamless integration.

Limitations ⚠️

  1. Works with one element at a time.
  2. Only creates horizontal slices.

🎯 Perfect for efficient, consistent slicing!
plugins.tagline: Figma Plugin enables users to create evenly sliced sections of a selected element on the canvas.

plugins.name: Image to Gradient library
plugins.description:
🎨 About

Image to Gradient Library lets you instantly convert any image into a reusable gradient preset in Figma with a single click. Extract key colors, fine-tune palettes, and save your custom gradients directly to your styles library—all within seconds.


🚀 Why Use It?

-Convert images into all types of gradients (linear, radial etc.) with a single click

-Shuffle, ignore, or select specific colors for precise control

-Instantly apply gradients to any layer

-Save as reusable styles for consistency across projects


🧠 Who Is It For?

Perfect for designers working with visual storytelling, brand development, or moodboards. Whether you're building a product UI or a campaign visual, turn inspiration into usable assets instantly.


⚡ What Makes It Different

-Intelligent color extraction from any image

-One-click gradient generation

-Customizable gradient types and color filtering

-Native style saving—no copy/paste needed

-Ultra-fast performance with an intuitive UI


🔐 Licensing

Free to use for personal and commercial projects.
plugins.tagline: Turn images in to gradient presets for you library you can reuse and apply to any layer

plugins.name: UniBold: Unicode Page Styler
plugins.description:
Transform your Figma workspace with sophisticated typography that stands out. UniBold converts standard text into elegant mathematical sans-serif bold characters, creating visual hierarchy and professional organization throughout your design files.


Why designers love UniBold:

  1. Create instant visual distinction between sections and components
  2. Maintain consistent typographic hierarchy across all projects
  3. Improve team navigation with clearly emphasized page names
  4. Enhance presentation-ready files with polished page organization


Getting started is simple:

  1. Select the page you want to restyle
  2. Choose the style that works best for you: Uppercase, Lowercase, or preserve your original formatting
  3. Apply the new bold Unicode style to your page name with a single click


Elevate your file organization from functional to exceptional. UniBold transforms the mundane task of page naming into an opportunity for refined design thinking—because even the smallest details deserve attention.

accepted.name: Petr "Stoky" Novak
accepted.description: My passions are product design, UI, and design systems...all at Emplifi

plugins.tagline: Bold your pages. Structure your designs. Simplify your workflow.

plugins.name: Floating Finder
plugins.description:
When designing in Figma, objects that appear to be within a frame but are actually outside of it will disappear when exported to PDF. Floating Finder detects “floating objects” within multiple selected frames and corrects them.


Figmaでデザイン作業中、「見た目はフレーム内にあるのに、実は外にある」オブジェクトがあると、PDF書き出しした時に消えてしまいます。Floating Finderは、選択した複数フレーム内にある“浮遊オブジェクト”を検出し、修正します。
plugins.tagline: Detect and Fix Floating Objects Outside Frames

130130.name: Floating Finder
130130.description:
When designing in Figma, objects that appear to be within a frame but are actually outside of it will disappear when exported to PDF. Floating Finder detects “floating objects” within multiple selected frames and corrects them.


Figmaでデザイン作業中、「見た目はフレーム内にあるのに、実は外にある」オブジェクトがあると、PDF書き出しした時に消えてしまいます。Floating Finderは、選択した複数フレーム内にある“浮遊オブジェクト”を検出し、修正します。
130130.tagline: Detect and Fix Floating Objects Outside Frames

plugins.name: Layer Name Modifier
plugins.description:
The Layer Name Modifier plugin makes it much easier to organize and manage your layer names in Figma, helping you keep your projects more organized and consistent. With this plugin, you can perform the following actions:


  1. Add a Text to Layer Names: Easily append a word of your choice to the end of layer names.
  2. Remove a Text from Layer Names: Quickly remove any unwanted word from the layer names.
  3. Remove a Text from Only the Last Words of Layer Names: Use this feature to remove a specific word only from the last words of the layer names.

This plugin is a perfect tool for organizing and standardizing layer names, especially in large projects. Save time and make your workflow more efficient!


HOW TO USE THIS PLUGIN?

Add text to layer name

  1. Select the layers you want to add t text o the layer names.
  2. Run the plugin.
  3. Enter the text you want to add to the layer names into the input.
  4. When you click the Add Text button, the text you entered is added to the layer name.


Remove text from layer name

  1. Select the layers you want to remove texts from the layer names.
  2. Run the plugin.
  3. Select the "Remove text" checkbox.
  4. Enter the text you want to remove from the layer names into the input.
  5. When you click the "Remove text" button, the relevant word in the selected layers is removed.
  6. If you only want to process the last words of the layer name, check the relevant checkbox.
  7. When you click the Remove Text button, the text you entered into the input is deleted if it is the last word of the layer name.
plugins.tagline: Layer Name Modifier helps organize and manage layer names in Figma, keeping projects consistent.

113351.description:

plugins.name: DT组件高亮 DT Component Highlighting
plugins.description:
Introduction

This Figma plugin allows users to visually highlight suspected components within a design, making it easier to locate and manage components. The plugin is ideal for users who need to inspect multiple components and interact with them quickly.


Function Description

•Highlight suspected components in selected frames.

•Locate and zoom into components within your Figma file.

•Export thumbnails of components for visual reference.

•Easily toggle component highlight on and off.


How to Use

1.Select one or more frames from your Figma file.

2.Click the “Show Component Highlight” button to highlight suspected components.

3.View the component list with thumbnails and names.

4.Click the “Locate” button to zoom in and select a specific component.

5.To remove the highlight, click “Hide Component Highlight.”


Notes

•The highlighted components are based on the plugin’s interpretation and might not fully match actual component usage.

•The plugin’s results are for reference purposes and may vary depending on design complexity.


介绍

这个 Figma 插件允许用户在设计中直观地高亮显示疑似组件，帮助轻松定位和管理组件。非常适合需要快速检查和交互多个组件的用户。


功能说明

•在选定的画框中高亮显示疑似组件。

•在 Figma 文件中定位并聚焦到组件。

•导出组件的缩略图以供视觉参考。

•轻松切换组件高亮状态。


使用方法

1.从 Figma 文件中选择一个或多个画框。

2.点击“显示组件高亮”按钮，高亮显示疑似组件。

3.查看带有缩略图和名称的组件列表。

4.点击“定位”按钮，放大并选择特定组件。

5.如需移除高亮，请点击“隐藏组件高亮”。


注意事项

•高亮显示的组件基于插件的解读，可能与实际组件使用情况不完全一致。

  1. •插件结果仅供参考，实际效果可能会因设计复杂性而有所不同。

accepted.name: KingweiCheung
accepted.description: Everything gets a response, but nothing gets a resolution. 事事有回应，事事不答应。

plugins.tagline: Easily Highlight and Manage DT Components in Your Design

plugins.name: Chameleon
plugins.description:
🦎 CHAMELEON


Chameleon is a Figma plugin that turns color token management into a breeze. Build smart palettes, structure tokens, and export directly into native Figma Variables.



🎨 KEY FEATURES


🎨 Smart palette generation — create harmonious color ramps from a single base color


🌒 Auto dark theme — instantly generate dark versions of your palettes


♿ A11Y mode — contrast-optimized palettes that meet WCAG accessibility standards


🧷 Figma Variables export — full support for collections, modes, and cross-collection aliases


📤 JSON import/export — compatible with Figma Variables and Token Studio


✏️ Flexible structure — rename shades, palettes, collections, and modes while preserving links



🌒 AUTO DARK THEME


Instantly generate perceptually balanced dark palettes based on your light theme.


How it works:

  1. Inverts brightness scale: lightest shade (50) becomes darkest, darkest (900) becomes lightest
  2. Base color remains at position 500
  3. Brightness follows a perceptual (non-linear) scale
  4. Saturation is increased for dark shades, reduced for light ones
  5. Additional correction ensures visual harmony



🎨 BASE MODE


Best for:

  1. Creating aesthetic palettes without strict contrast rules
  2. Branding and accent color systems
  3. Visually balanced UIs with emphasis on artistic control


Generation logic:

  1. Base color is placed at center (shade 500)
  2. Builds out lighter (50–400) and darker (600–900) shades
  3. Brightness and saturation adjust relative to the base



♿ A11Y MODE


Palettes generated with perceptual brightness, ensuring strong contrast between shades.


Best for:

  1. Interfaces requiring WCAG compliance
  2. Government, medical, educational and fintech products
  3. Inclusive design for wide audiences


Generation logic:

  1. Builds a scale of perceived brightness
  2. Base color is positioned where its brightness fits best
  3. Shades are calibrated for target contrast
  4. Contrast between neighbors ≥ 1.3:1



📌 HOW TO USE


  1. Create your base palettes in the "Global" tab (5 to 15 shades)
  2. Enable A11Y mode if needed
  3. Switch between light and dark themes to evaluate the result
  4. Export everything to Figma Variables or JSON
  5. Youtube



⚙️ UINDER YHE HOOD


  1. HSL-based ramp generation
  2. Edge brightness: Light — 95% → 20%, Dark — 15% → 85%
  3. Auto positioning of base color (especially in A11Y mode)
  4. Built-in WCAG contrast checker
  5. Visual base marker (★)
  6. Full support for Figma Variables & Token Studio structure



🚧 STATUS


This plugin is in beta. We welcome feedback and are actively improving it.
plugins.tagline: Color token generator with automatic shade scales and Figma Variables export

131165.name: Chameleon

plugins.name: Markly - Paste/Copy from Markdown
plugins.description:
Markly makes it effortless to bring Markdown into your Figma designs or export Figma text layers as Markdown. Paste or type Markdown to instantly create styled text layers, copy selected layers as clean Markdown, and map Markdown elements to your local text styles for brand consistency.


The plugin has three command launcher:

  1. Convert from Markdown: Paste or select Markdown text and generate Figma layers.
  2. Copy as Markdown: Export Figma text layers as ready-to-use Markdown.
  3. Match Styles: Map headings, lists, and links to your custom Figma text styles.


Includes live preview, dark/light theme support, and an intuitive manual copy UI for full clipboard compatibility.
plugins.tagline: Paste, copy, and map Markdown content to Figma text layers with style.

133585.name: Markly - Paste/Copy from Markdown
133585.description:
Markly makes it effortless to bring Markdown into your Figma designs or export Figma text layers as Markdown. Paste or type Markdown to instantly create styled text layers, copy selected layers as clean Markdown, and map Markdown elements to your local text styles for brand consistency.


The plugin has three command launcher:

  1. Convert from Markdown: Paste or select Markdown text and generate Figma layers.
  2. Copy as Markdown: Export Figma text layers as ready-to-use Markdown.
  3. Match Styles: Map headings, lists, and links to your custom Figma text styles.


Includes live preview, dark/light theme support, and an intuitive manual copy UI for full clipboard compatibility.
133585.tagline: Paste, copy, and map Markdown content to Figma text layers with style.

plugins.name: IconAdda
plugins.description:
Enhance your design workflow with the Iconadda plugin for Figma! Instantly access a wide variety of high-quality, customizable icons, illustrations, stickers, and logos directly within your Figma workspace. Whether you're creating a website, app, or social media content, Iconadda offers you an extensive collection of design assets to streamline your process. With easy integration and seamless design capabilities, boost your creativity and elevate your projects with iconadda's diverse assets.

plugins.name: Autolayout converter Helper
plugins.description:
Effortlessly locate frames and take control of your design exploration!!!


Navigate to complex Figma layers with ease! This plugin helps you traverse design hierarchies by stopping at frames and allowing you to decide the next move. Customize your search—pause anywhere and pick it up whenever you're ready (at that moment perform your change at layer✨ ). Perfect for designers and developers who need precise, targeted frame navigation.


Key Features :

  1. Start Search from Any Node : Begin traversal from any selected layer in your Figma file, drilling down through layers and frames.
  2. Stop on Frame Detection : Pauses at each frame, allowing you to review, edit, or proceed to the next frame.
  3. Customisable Navigation : Choose from Next to continue, Skip to bypass children, or Custom Stop to pause as needed.


Use Cases :

  1. Designers and Developers : Streamline work on large, complex Figma files with multiple frames and layers.
  2. Efficient Frame Location : Locate frames quickly, without tedious manual scrolling.
  3. Auto Layout Validation : Essential for platforms or projects requiring strict auto layout adherence for accurate design and responsive outputs. This plugin helps ensure each frame aligns to the full auto layout setup, ensuring optimal structure and consistency.
  4. Flexible Layer Exploration : Customize your traversal to focus on only the layers that matter most for faster design reviews and targeted edits.


How to Use :

  1. Select your starting node in Figma, click Start, and let the plugin begin searching.
  2. When a layer is detected, choose Next to proceed, Skip to bypass children, or Custom Stop to pause where desired.


Boost productivity, stay organized, and manage complex Figma designs with this efficient layers finding plugin. Ideal for design reviews, auto layout validation, focused edits, and streamlined development workflows!
plugins.tagline: Navigate layers with ease: control traversal and reduce your manual drilling time by 40%

plugins.name: PageStream
plugins.description:
The ultimate Figma plugin you need to create, manage, and share Figma file templates. Whether you’re working solo or part of a large team, this plugin ensures consistency and efficiency when creating design projects. Sound interesting? Create your account and run the plug-in


How it works?

  1. Create and activate your account
  2. Go back to Figma
  3. Log in the plugin
  4. Start creating your templates


Why do I need an account?

You need to create an account to save your templates and use them anytime you need.


What you can do with PageStream?

  1. Generate different templates for your teams or kinds of projects.
  2. Edit or delete the different templates.
  3. Drag and drop the pages to reorganize the list easily when editing.
  4. Did we mention that you can SAVE your file templates?
  5. And YES! Of course you can add emojis


Why did we create PageStream?

We’re really passionate about creating and learning new things, and we absolutely love remote work and team collaboration.

We’ve observed that many teams struggle with inconsistent files, which can make cross-functional and team collaboration a bit tricky. Moreover, all designers know that spending time creating pages can be pretty tedious. So, we challenged ourselves to solve these two problems over the weekend.


We have ideas for the next version, but please, if you have any recommendations or feedback, let us know. We hope you find this plugin handy!


Enjoy the day!
plugins.tagline: Create and save templates for your design file structure.

plugins.name: Bulk image exporter
plugins.description:
Speed up your workflow by exporting all images from your Figma page in just one click! This plugin collects every image and packs them into a handy ZIP file — no more exporting one by one.


You can also set a size limit (default: 1MB) to automatically compress images without losing too much quality. Perfect for quick exporting, sharing assets with devs and optimizing performance.


Features:


  1. Export all images on the current page in a ZIP file
  2. Set max size per image (e.g. 1MB or less)
  3. Check the current download status.
  4. Download each image individually


👉 Please note: this plugin is currently in beta, feedback is welcome!

accepted.name: Lorenzo Brandimarte
accepted.description: Product and UI Designer | No-code developer

plugins.tagline: Export every image on your page in a single ZIP

135102.name: Bulk image exporter

  1. Export all images on the current page in a ZIP file
  2. Set max size per image (e.g. 1MB or less)
  3. Check the current download status.
  4. Download each image individually


👉 Please note: this plugin is currently in beta, feedback is welcome!

135102.tagline: Export every image on your page in a single ZIP

plugins.name: Ugly Images
plugins.description:
Your design looks flawless, filled with perfect stock photos… but reality hits different. Users will upload poorly cropped pictures, badly lit selfies, and blurry screenshots. Ugly Images helps you design for the real world—where images are anything but perfect.


🔹 Fill your designs with truly awful images – See how your UI handles the chaos.

🔹 Forget pixel-perfect mockups – Apps rely on user-generated content.

🔹 Break free from the stock photo illusion – Prepare your UI for the unexpected.


Ready to see your design as it will actually look? Try it and embrace the ugly.
plugins.tagline: Mockups Lie. Ugly Images Don't

plugins.name: Text Style Group Clone
plugins.description:
This simple plugin duplicates local text styles by hierarchy. It’s useful when creating multiple text styles, such as sans-serif and serif, or desktop and mobile variants.

Due to Figma API limitations, font settings such as Details and Variables are not copied.


登録されているテキストスタイルをグループごと複製するのプラグインです。

Figma APIで取得できないOpenType FeaturesやVariable設定はコピーできません。
plugins.tagline: Duplicate hierarchical text styles. (Only basic font settings are copied.)

plugins.name: Multiple Text Clone Components
plugins.description:
Summary

Plug-in to duplicate a component and insert text.

When multiple lines of text are entered, they are duplicated with “1 line = 1 component”.

Example: Running with 3 lines of text will duplicate 3 components


コンポーネントを複製して事前に入力したテキストを挿入するプラグインです。

複数行のテキストを入力すると「1行=1コンポーネント」で複製されます。

例：3行分のテキストを入力すると3つのコンポーネントが複製される


Use

  1. Create Components
  2. Place text inside components or add text properties
  3. Enter the text you want to duplicate in the plugin panel
  4. Select and run the component created in 2.


  1. コンポーネントを作成
  2. コンポーネントの中にテキストを配置、もしくはテキストプロパティを追加
  3. 複製したいテキストをプラグインパネルに入力
  4. 2で作成したコンポーネントを選択して実行
plugins.tagline: Plug-in to duplicate a component and insert text.

plugins.description: The plugin extracts the dominant color from an image using the ColorThief algorithm, reduces its opacity to 0.3 (against a white background), and converts the adjusted color to a hex value you can use in your designs. It’s great for creating subtle backgrounds for images.

plugins.name: Colors from the HEX List
plugins.description:
Simple as it is. This plugin creates neatly organized color swatches in Figma from a list of HEX values.

You can paste plain HEX values for opaque colors or enable transparent mode to include alpha percentages. The plugin automatically groups, names, and sorts the swatches by hue and brightness — perfect for visualizing palettes or documenting tokens.


🔹 Grouped by hue and saturation

🔹 Transparent colors sorted by opacity

🔹 Auto-layout-ready and clean naming

🔹 Works with any HEX color list
plugins.tagline: Generate color swatches from HEX or HEX + alpha input

127207.name: Colors from the HEX List
127207.description:
Simple as it is. This plugin creates neatly organized color swatches in Figma from a list of HEX values.

You can paste plain HEX values for opaque colors or enable transparent mode to include alpha percentages. The plugin automatically groups, names, and sorts the swatches by hue and brightness — perfect for visualizing palettes or documenting tokens.


🔹 Grouped by hue and saturation

🔹 Transparent colors sorted by opacity

🔹 Auto-layout-ready and clean naming

🔹 Works with any HEX color list
127207.tagline: Generate color swatches from HEX or HEX + alpha input

plugins.name: logoplacer
plugins.description:
Logo Placer simplifies the process of adding multiple logos to your designs while maintaining clean spacing and visual consistency. Perfect for partner sections, client showcases, sponsor walls, and more.


Features:

Upload up to 4 logos with automatic placement

Smart resizing that maintains logo aspect ratios

Multi-frame support – Select multiple frames and place logos simultaneously

Dynamic scaling based on frame size

Equal spacing between logos, every time

Reset button to quickly start over

Clean and intuitive interface


Ideal For:

Creating partner/client sections

Designing sponsor walls

Showcasing collaborations

Building marketing materials

Presenting design portfolios


How to Use:

  1. Select one or more frames in your design
  2. Open the Logo Placer plugin
  3. Upload up to 4 logos
  4. Watch as they're automatically resized, placed, and spaced
  5. Hit reset to start fresh anytime


Why Use Logo Placer?

When you have a lot of design assets and deadlines, placing logos manually can be tedious and error-prone. You often deal with:


  1. Inconsistent sizing
  2. Uneven spacing
  3. Manual alignment headaches

Logo Placer removes that friction by automating placement and ensuring a professional layout every time—no grids, nudging, or guesswork needed.
plugins.tagline: "Automatically arrange and space multiple logos in your designs"

plugins.name: Round to 8
plugins.description:
Round to 8 helps you maintain consistent spacing and measurements in your designs by automatically rounding values to multiples of 4, 8, or any custom value.


🎯 Key Features:

• Round multiple properties at once:

- Auto Layout (Padding & Spacing)

- Position (X & Y coordinates)

- Size (Width & Height)

- Font Size

- All Properties option


🎨 Flexible Options:

• Choose your rounding multiple:

- Multiple of 4

- Multiple of 8 (recommended for most designs)

- Custom value for specific needs


🔍 Smart Selection:

• Apply to selected elements only

• Include all children elements

• Preserve component instances


💡 Perfect For:

• Maintaining consistent spacing in design systems

• Cleaning up imported designs

• Ensuring pixel-perfect layouts

• Standardizing measurements across teams


⚡️ Quick Tips:

1. Select any frame or component

2. Choose properties to round

3. Pick your preferred multiple

4. Click Apply and watch the magic happen!


Made with ❤️ for the Figma Community
plugins.tagline: Round your design values to consistent multiples for pixel-perfect layouts

plugins.name: Create
plugins.description:
Building most products takes way longer than it should

It takes months to build common features. Create uses AI code generation to move so fast, it feels like magic.
plugins.tagline: Bring your vision to life

65717.name: Create

plugins.name: Smart Shadow Pro
plugins.description:
Smart Shadow Pro is your advanced tool for creating clean, consistent, and visually stunning shadows in Figma. Designed for designers who care about precision and elegance, this plugin gives you full control over shadow behavior with real-time visual feedback.


🎯 Adjust blur, spread, opacity, offset and color effortlessly

🎯 Drag to reposition shadow direction with smooth UX

🎯 Choose from professionally-tuned presets: Soft, Medium, and Hard

🎯 See everything in a beautiful live preview panel

🎯 Works instantly on selected layers — never overwrites unless you want it


Whether you're designing soft cards or strong elevation systems, Smart Shadow Pro helps you maintain pixel-perfect depth across your design system.


Built with developers in mind. Loved by UI pros.
plugins.tagline: Control shadows like a pro.

networkAccess.reasoning: Plugin does not make network requests. Fonts are loaded only by the UI iframe.

plugins.name: FillGPT
plugins.description:
FillGPT is an AI-powered Figma plugin designed to improve workflow efficiency by automating content generation, text optimization, and design analysis. It helps designers, copywriters, and product teams enhance UI copy, rename layers, and analyze design best practices.


Key features:


- Smart layer renaming to keep files organized

- AI-generated content for UI elements and marketing copy

- Copy enhancement, including expanding, shortening, and rephrasing text

- Tone and style adjustment to match different contexts

- Design analysis to improve clarity, accessibility, and readability

- Grammar and spelling error detection and correction

- Text summarization and expansion for better content flow


FillGPT streamlines the design process, ensuring high-quality text and a more efficient workflow within Figma.
plugins.tagline: Use ChatGPT and Gemini in figma

plugins.name: FontChanger by CreativeRafat
plugins.description: FontChanger is a powerful Figma plugin that converts all text fonts in your design into a dynamic font variable. Simply input your desired font, and FontChanger will update all text layers while maintaining flexibility through Figma’s typography system. Save time, stay consistent, and streamline your design workflow effortlessly!
plugins.tagline: Effortlessly transform your Figma fonts with just one click!

122589.name: FontChanger by CreativeRafat
122589.description: FontChanger is a powerful Figma plugin that converts all text fonts in your design into a dynamic font variable. Simply input your desired font, and FontChanger will update all text layers while maintaining flexibility through Figma’s typography system. Save time, stay consistent, and streamline your design workflow effortlessly!
122589.tagline: Effortlessly transform your Figma fonts with just one click!

plugins.name: Typosys
plugins.description:
Typosys is a Figma plugin designed to simplify and accelerate the creation and management of typography systems.

By selecting a base font and size, you can effortlessly generate styles that scale proportionally. The plugin supports custom naming, font faces, weights, sizes, line heights, and letter spacing. It also introduces a multi-dimensional mode system, allowing you to tailor styles for specific devices like desktop, tablet, and mobile. Once completed, the styles are imported into Figma, fully linked to dynamically generated variable collections.



Benefits


  1. Faster workflow: Set up your typography system in minutes.
  2. Consistent scaling: Styles are proportional to the base size for a cohesive design.
  3. Flexibility: Each style can be individually customized.
  4. Device-specific optimization: Use modes to adjust styles for different screen sizes.
  5. Variable integration: Styles are automatically connected to dynamic Figma variable collections.



Key Features


  1. Base font and size selection
  2. Proportional typography style generation
  3. Customizable font face, weight, size, line-height, and letter-spacing
  4. Mode-based dimensions (Desktop, Tablet, Mobile)
  5. Automatic variable generation and linking
  6. One-click import

accepted.name: Roland Hidvegi
accepted.description: Roland Hidvegi is a Product Designer — crafting digital experiences, from vision to final touches, passionate about creating things that make people happy.

plugins.tagline: Streamline your typography system in seconds.

plugins.name: Colorama
plugins.description:
Type in a hex color value and generate a 0-1000 number range for your primitive tokens. Not sure if this should be closer to 100, 200, or somewhere in between? Plug your values into Colorama and get a precise variable name.


Want them on your canvas? Just a click away.


Need your dark color values to be lower on the number scale? Select the direction to flip the number order on light/dark tones. Then click to copy and paste the values into your Figma variables collection.


Run several values at once with a comma separated text string. For example:

#ff0000, #123ABC, #223344
plugins.tagline: A powerful yet simple way to name your design tokens as primitive variables in Figma.

119934.name: Colorama
119934.description:
Type in a hex color value and generate a 0-1000 number range for your primitive tokens. Not sure if this should be closer to 100, 200, or somewhere in between? Plug your values into Colorama and get a precise variable name.


Want them on your canvas? Just a click away.


Need your dark color values to be lower on the number scale? Select the direction to flip the number order on light/dark tones. Then click to copy and paste the values into your Figma variables collection.


Run several values at once with a comma separated text string. For example:

#ff0000, #123ABC, #223344
119934.release_notes: Added the ability to place swatches on the canvas to quickly visualize primitive token names and hex values in one spot.
119934.tagline: A powerful yet simple way to name your design tokens as primitive variables in Figma.
